Title: A Wei fights alone against a bunch of enemies
Publisher: Hubei renmin chubanshe (湖北人民出版社)
Notes: From the series The brave people of Vietnam are sure to win (Yingxiong de yuenan renmin bisheng - 英雄的越南人必胜)Translation of the text under the title: "During the 'eradication' battle in R.P., the guerrilla fighter A Wei who guarded the bridge and sniped the enemy was encircled from behind. Quick-witted as A Wei was, he pushed the enemy’s rifle away and knocked down three of them. Since his own rifle was broken, he used hand grenades to kill four more. At the end, he and his war buddy together broke through the enemy’s encirclement."
